comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Compile the following code with advanced optimizations: try { new Function('this is an error'); } catch (e) { alert('Error caught!'); } alert('Done.'); What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I expect the compiler not to change the functionality, so when I run the compiled code, I get both alerts. In reality, this is compiled to "alert('Done.');", changing behavior. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? http://closure-compiler.appspot.com/home Code run at 2012-10-25 14:15.
BUILTIN_FUNCTIONS_WITHOUT_SIDEEFFECTS (NodeUtil.java) do not include "Function", whereas es3.js classifies the Function constructor as free from side-effects.
This issue was closed by revision r2292.
